author: andreasmyth
msg: [JIRA CXF-63] Removed circular dependencies resulting from wsdl.xsd importing http-conf.xsd etc.
Replaced wsdl.xsd by its original version and customised using an external binding file.
[JIRA CXF-64] Moved schemas for transport and binding specific wsdl extensors into the resp. binding.transport modules.
[JIRA CXF-25] Replace dependencies on old configuration api in http and jms transports:
Generated base beans and changed implementation to inherit from those.
Removed Configuration type data members and calls to ConfigurationBuilder.getConfiguration(...).
Replaced calls to configuration.get(String name, Class<?> type) by calld to getters in base classes.

Changed build order of common-metacode so that when the CXF xsd plugin is used for the first time a dependency on the xjc plugins can be declared (even though the extensions may not be used at this point). This is a workaround for what looks like a maven bug.

author: angela
msg: resourcePath instead of repositoryPath used for itemExists check

author: angela
msg: resourcePath instead of repositoryPath used for check before retrieving item

author: bago
msg: Remove unused tests after the conversion to YAML of the previous ones (JSPF-26).

author: angela
msg: missing-auth-mapping is defined with wrong servlet.
